I didn't really like this final chapter. The ending itself is alright, but the tone of this chapter is completely different from the others. The other three were much more steamy and intimate as we saw Nanaho slowly giving in to the pleasure, but this chapter just felt cold and distant as we see the events unfolding through a video call. I feel like the quality of the art took a bit of a dip as well. Maybe this underwhelming conclusion is because this final chapter wasn't made in time for Comiket, or maybe the artist just didn't know how to end the series, or maybe he felt like including some unnecessary pseudo NTR that ultimately watered down the quality of the final product. Who knows. In any case, it was enjoyable. This final chapter could be way better, but the other three make up for it.
Just like the elf one at least the guy took responsibility at the end.

I love how people get worked up because of a fiction story, I mean most people would notice that shit right away and would've taken counter measures IF it something that would've happened. why do I say if? because something like this is unrealistic to happen. this story is build on 3 categories only which are: A) 3 people only mainly the female and the antagonist, no friends no other family members and no laws. B) if you remove the "Obstacles" meaning you have a perfect victim that can't do anything against the assault and taken advantage. C) showing the horrible did to the father which again, cannot do anything about it because this world that the author built has no laws about it. don't forget, it is incest. the ugly bastard was doing it with his niece. it would surely be enough to separate both if the law, other family members or friends new about it.
in conclusion its just a simple 4 part story that doesn't need to be taken seriously and has nothing to do with real life. just enjoy
